raw_infobox.name: Hakeem Olajuwon
raw_infobox.image: Nigerian President Buhari Stands With Secretary Kerry, U.S. Delegation After They Attended His Inauguration Ceremony (cropped).jpg
raw_infobox.caption: Olajuwon in 2015
raw_infobox.highlights:
* 2× List of NBA champions (1994, 1995)
* 2× Bill Russell NBA Finals Most Valuable Player Award (1994, 1995)
* NBA Most Valuable Player Award (1993)
* 12× List of NBA All-Stars (1985 NBA All-Star Game–1990 NBA All-Star Game, 1992 NBA All-Star Game–1997 NBA All-Star Game)
* 6× All-NBA Team (1986–1988, 1992, 1993, 1996)
* 3× All-NBA Team (1985, 1989, 1995)
* 3× All-NBA Team (1990, 1994, 1998)
* 2× NBA Defensive Player of the Year Award (1992, 1993)
* 5× NBA All-Defensive Team (1986, 1987, 1989, 1992, 1993)
* 4× NBA All-Defensive Team (1984, 1990, 1995, 1996)
* NBA All-Rookie Team (1984)
* 2× List of National Basketball Association annual rebounding leaders (1988, 1989)
* 3× List of National Basketball Association annual blocks leaders (1989, 1990, 1992)
* No. 34 Houston Rockets retired numbers
* NBA anniversary team (50 Greatest Players in NBA History, NBA 75th Anniversary Team)
* NCAA Final Four Most Outstanding Player (1983 NCAA Division I men's basketball tournament)
* Helms Foundation College Basketball Player of the Year (1982–83 NCAA Division I men's basketball season)
* Consensus first-team NCAA Men's Basketball All-Americans (1984 NCAA Men's Basketball All-Americans)
* List of NCAA Division I men's basketball season rebounding leaders (1984)
* Southwest Conference Men's Basketball Player of the Year (1984)
* First-team All-Southwest Conference (1984)
* Second-team All-SWC (1983)
* No. 34 Houston Cougars men's basketball retired numbers
